cd ${PKG_ROOT}
go run ${WORK}/main.go
cd ${WORK}
cmp stdout want.txt

-- main.go --
package main

import . "github.com/efd6/dispear"

func main() {
	DESCRIPTION("remove")

	REMOVE("field1")
	REMOVE("field1", "field2")
	REMOVE("field1", "field2").KEEP("field3", "field4")
	REMOVE().KEEP("field3", "field4")

	Generate()
}
-- want.txt --
---
description: remove
processors:
  - remove:
      tag: remove_field1_2a7f3b36
      field:
        - field1
  - remove:
      tag: remove_bf50c7f6
      field:
        - field1
        - field2
  - remove:
      tag: remove_7c823e46
      field:
        - field1
        - field2
      keep:
        - field3
        - field4
  - remove:
      tag: remove_ca1f9acb
      keep:
        - field3
        - field4
